DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Version 2 Adult Mental Health Domain Cognitive Function Abilities PC11r Past 7 Days Have Trouble Remembering Where I Put Things Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of how often in the past seven days they have had trouble remembering where they put things, like their keys or wallet, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Mental Health Domain Cognitive Function Subordinate Domain Past Week Have Trouble Remembering Where I Put Things Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's mental health._The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess perceived difficulties in intellectual processes, capabilities, and deficits._The most recent week, including today._A question about whether an individual has or had trouble remembering where they put things._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Mental Health Domain Cognitive Function Subordinate Domain

Property.preferredName: Past Week Have Trouble Remembering Where I Put Things Score

Concepts.longName: Have Trouble Remembering Where I Put Things
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual has or had trouble remembering where they put things.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredName: PROMIS Quantitative Frequency Score 5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS items that describes a range of subjective scores for representing how often an individual experiences something from 1: Never, to 5: Very Often (Several times a day).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: On most occasions, or in most situations.

Concepts.definition: On most occasions, or in most situations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
